positions.title: Product Development & AI Features
positions.description:
- Spearheaded the creation, analysis, and integration of machine learning models and API technologies (platforms like OpenAI's GPT4o, Google Cloud, and Azure) for Vlogmi's Creator Studio feature, ensuring its capability to deliver real-time personalized audience data to content creators and marketers.

- Integrated an Instagram Competitor Analysis Feature for Vlogmi by leveraging machine learning and OPEN AI API integrations to generate content summaries across users and analyze competitor engagement on Instagram within the same content category. This feature helps users understand competitor strategies and optimize their own content for better reach and engagement.

- Collaborated closely with the team to ideate, implement features, and create user experience flow charts for the Vlogmi app, aimed at enhancing engagement, usability, insights, and revenue generation.
--
Vlogmi is a multi-medium tool for social media, specifically helping creators, brands and marketers get more views, engagement and revenue. Vlogmi's long-term vision drives the next generation of content creators to express their creativity through authenticity - to create the future of a healthier, more positive social media.

positions.title: AI Software Development & Marketing
positions.description:
- Built Internexxus's AI Linkedin-To-Resume Feature using ChatOpenAI, Langchain and Open AI's LLMs, and a  RAG system for resume template information. 
- Built Internexxus's job postings system using REST API services for data scraping, GPT 4o for data reconstruction and PostgreSQL for data storage and management. 
- Used React JS frontend frameworks, specifically Tailwind and Typescript to designed Internexxus's "For Universities" website landing page UI Design.
- Orchestrated onboarding and outreach processes such as user integration, workflow, quarterly KPIs, and pitch decks for target consumer groups

positions.title: Data Strategy & Outreach
positions.description:
- Integrated prompt engineering tools with Open AI's GPT 4.0 API to enhance and build ShoMe's Takeaways feature, and reranked search engine data for tactical startup and fundraising questions. 
- Orchestrated comprehensive roadmaps for user integration along with intuitive UI/UX features, ensuring seamless onboarding while maximizing user satisfaction and retention.

positions.title: Instructor Assistant - Mobile App Development
positions.description:
- Implemented and facilitated instruction of SwiftUI and Xcode curriculum to 200+ students (scholars) over the course of multiple two-week camps over academic summer term
- Fostered community interactions between female and non-binary students to challenge the status quo and close the gender gap in Computer Science
